scripts.deploy-all: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-token.ts --network milkomeda && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-oracle.ts --network milkomeda && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-consumer.ts --network milkomeda
scripts.deploy-oracle-and-consumer: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-oracle.ts --network milkomeda && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-consumer.ts --network milkomeda
